com.meetandgo.meetandgo

Class FireBaseDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.meetandgo.meetandgo.FireBaseDB

  • public class FireBaseDB
extends java.lang.Object
    This static class is handling all the interactions with the FireBase database In java only nested classes can be static so here all methods will be set to static TODO: Massive refactor - divide functions by object type by creating e.g. UserFireBaseDB
